title: Video Game Designer
description:
**Job Title: Game Designer**

**Location: Ahmedabad**

**Experience : 1 to 3 year**

**About Us:**  
We are hiring for a gaming company based in Ahmedabad, specializing in the development of both 2D and 3D mobile games across various genres including casual, hyper-casual, and hybrid casual. We pride ourselves on creating engaging and innovative gaming experiences that are easy to pick up and play.

**Position Overview:**  
They are seeking a creative and passionate Game Designer to join mobile gaming team. As a Game Designer, you will collaborate closely with the senior design team to conceptualize, design, and develop new mobile games. You will play a key role in creating and maintaining design documentation, including game design documents, game mechanics, gameplay flow, asset lists, level design, and design specifications.

**Responsibilities:**

* Collaborate with the senior design team to develop innovative game concepts and features for mobile games.
* Create and maintain design documentation, including game design documents, game mechanics, gameplay flow, asset lists, level design, and design specifications.
* Stay up-to-date with industry trends and technologies, particularly in the mobile gaming sector.
* Conduct thorough research on popular and trending mobile games to identify key gameplay mechanics, design elements, and player engagement strategies.
* Work closely with cross-functional teams including developers, artists, and testers to ensure the successful implementation of game designs.
* Participate in brainstorming sessions and contribute creative ideas to enhance game concepts and features.
* Provide feedback and suggestions to improve existing games and gameplay mechanics.
* Strong written and verbal communication skills.

**Requirements:**

* Bachelor's degree in Game Design, Computer Science, or a related field.
* Proven experience (1-3 year) in game design, preferably in the mobile gaming industry.
* Proficiency in design tools such as Unity, Unreal Engine, or similar game development platforms.
* Strong understanding of game mechanics, gameplay flow, and player psychology.
* Ability to research and analyze trending games and incorporate successful elements into new game designs.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team environment.
* Passion for gaming and a creative mindset with the ability to think outside the box.
* Experience with Agile development methodologies is a plus.

title: PHP Developer
description:
Greetings Candidates,

Job Title:

**PHP Web Developer**

Job Details:

**Qualification: BE CE/ BE IT/ BCA/MCA**

**No.of Position: 05**

**Job Type: Work from Office**

**Location: Navarngpura (Ahmedabad)**

**Must Require Skills: PHP, JavaScript, AJAX, and API**

* **1-3 Years of Experience**
* **Strong Technical and Research Skills.**
* **Good communication and analytical skills.**
* **Knowledge of Open-source WordPress, Magento, Drupal, Zen Cart, etc.**

**Company Overview:**

TriCore Infotech is a leading web development company known for delivering innovative web solutions to our clients. We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced PHP Web Developer with a minimum of 1 to 3 years of professional experience, along with expertise in WordPress, Magento, Prestashop, Vue.js, and React. Join our dynamic team to work on exciting projects and make a significant impact.

**Job Description:**

As a PHP Web Developer at TriCore Infotech, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining web applications, e-commerce platforms, and custom solutions for our clients. Your proficiency in PHP and your knowledge of CMS Expertise: WordPress, Magento, and Prestashop will be essential to delivering high-quality, scalable, and performant web solutions. Vue.js and React skills will be a plus.

**Responsibilities:**

* **Web Development:** Design, develop, and maintain web applications and websites using PHP, ensuring code quality, security, and performance.
* **CMS Expertise:** Utilize your expertise in WordPress, Magento, and Prestashop to create custom themes, plugins, and modules, as well as perform platform customization and integrations.
* **Front-End Development:** Collaborate with front-end developers to integrate user-facing elements using Vue.js and React, ensuring seamless user experiences.
* **E-commerce Solutions:** Develop, optimize, and maintain e-commerce websites and online stores, including shopping cart functionality, payment gateways, and inventory management.
* **Database Management:** Work with databases (e.g., MySQL) to design and optimize database schemas, write complex SQL queries, and ensure data integrity.
* **API Development:** Create and maintain RESTful APIs for communication between front-end and back-end systems.
* **Version Control:** Use version control systems (e.g., Git) to manage and track code changes, collaborating effectively with team members.
* **Performance Optimization:** Identify and resolve performance bottlenecks, optimize code, and improve website speed and responsiveness.
* **Troubleshooting:** Debug and resolve technical issues, bugs, and errors in a timely manner, ensuring seamless website operation.
* **Documentation:** Maintain technical documentation, including system architecture, code comments, and project documentation.
* **Stay Updated:** Stay current with industry trends, technologies, and best practices to continuously enhance your skills and contribute to innovative solutions.

**Salary & Other Benefits:**

* No Bar For the Right Candidate
* Paid Leave
* Advantage of Diwali Bonus
* Friendly Working environment
* Employee Development plans
* Chance to work with Leading International Brands
* Chance to work on multiple Technologies
* Refreshment Breaks & Activities
* Care & Appreciation
* Birthday & Festivals Celebration
* Games/Picnic/Event

To apply, please send your resume, a link to your portfolio, and a cover letter detailing your relevant experience to **career@tricoreitsolutions.com** with the subject line "Applying for PHP Web Developer". You can contact us at **+91 7359125595** for an interview once confirm your availability.

TriCore InfoTech Pvt. Ltd.

title: 3d Artist
description:
As a 3D Artist, you will be responsible for creating visually stunning and technically accurate 3D assets, environments, characters, and animations for various projects. Your role will involve collaborating with a team of designers, animators, and developers to bring concepts to life and deliver high-quality content that meets project requirements and deadlines.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* **3D Modeling:** Create detailed 3D models of characters, objects, environments, and props using industry-standard software such as Maya, Blender, or 3ds Max. Ensure that models are optimized for performance without compromising visual quality.
* **Texturing and Shading:** Apply textures, materials, and shaders to 3D models to achieve realistic or stylized appearances. Utilize tools like Substance Painter or Photoshop to create high-quality textures and maps.
* **Rigging and Animation:** Rig characters and objects for animation, including skeletal and facial rigging. Produce captivating animations for characters and objects, including movements, gestures, and interactions.
* **Lighting and Rendering:** Set up lighting rigs and environments to enhance visual appeal and mood. Render high-quality images and animations using rendering software like Arnold, V-Ray, or Unreal Engine.
* **Collaboration:** Work closely with designers, art directors, and developers to understand project requirements and translate concepts into compelling visual experiences. Collaborate effectively within a team environment, incorporating feedback and iterating on designs as necessary.
* **Quality Assurance:** Conduct thorough testing and troubleshooting to ensure that 3D assets integrate seamlessly into projects and meet technical specifications and performance requirements.
* **Research and Development:** Stay up-to-date with industry trends, tools, and techniques for 3D modeling, animation, and rendering. Continuously explore new technologies and workflows to improve efficiency and quality of work.

**Requirements:**

* Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience in Computer Animation, Digital Arts, or related field.
* Proficiency in 3D modeling, texturing, rigging, animation, lighting, and rendering.
* Strong artistic and creative skills, with a keen eye for detail and aesthetics.
* Expertise in industry-standard software such as Maya,Mari, Blender, ZBrush, Substance Painter, and Adobe Creative Suite.
* Solid understanding of animation principles, anatomy, and character design.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team environment.
* Strong problem-solving abilities and a proactive attitude towards learning and self-improvement.
* Previous experience in game development, film production, advertising, or related industries is a plus.

Job Types: Full-time, Fresher, Internship  
Contract length: 3 months

Salary: From ₹5,000.00 per month

Benefits:

* Food provided
* Internet reimbursement
* Paid time off

Schedule:

* Day shift

Supplemental pay types:

* Quarterly bonus

Work Location: In person

title: Senior Administrator
description:
**Job Description**
-------------------


**Job Title:**
Senior Kubernetes Administrator
**Location:**
Hyderabad, India
**Schedule:**
Full-Time, Permanent
**Team:**
61-867 - Technology Operations - Infrastructure
**Department:**
A - Dept HM uses to open req
**What's your new role about?**
-------------------------------


**WHAT'S YOUR NEW ROLE ABOUT?**  

You will be joining the DAZN Platform Team. Our role is to reduce the time our business developers spend worrying about infrastructure, security, observability, deployment and other underlying systems.

We develop and maintain a common platform where these things are taken care of, so the business developers can get on writing DAZN’s world-leading product.
We do this using Kubernetes alongside cloud-native components, and third-party tools such as Hashicorp Vault, Github and New Relic among others.

Your days will be spent making sure our services are deployed safely, quickly, cost-effectively and enable self-service build-run-own by the development teams. You’ll be writing and reviewing code, talking with and supporting developers across the world, and working with cool people and systems to get this done.

We are blameless, agile, caring and supportive. We succeed or fail as a team.
### **HERE'S WHAT YOU WILL DO**

* Continuously improve the Platform that underpins DAZN’s services
* Write code, not just YAML or config files
* Help design and build our brand-new cloud-agnostic Platform layer
* Work with modern CNCF technologies like Kubernetes, Envoy, ArgoCD
* Be involved in large scale Cloud deployments, networking, and infrastructure across all 3 major cloud providers (AWS, Azure, GCP)
* Improve our authn/authz, security processes and tooling
* Participate, be heard, influence, grow, and make a difference
* Being adaptable and ready for on-call support is essential in our role. It's like being the superhero of our team, ready to swoop in and save the day whenever the need arises.

### **DO YOU HAVE THESE ESSENTIALS?**

* An intimate understanding of Experience building, securing, and managing Kubernetes clusters for others to use
* A sound knowledge and experience with containerised or serverless workloads
* Coding experience (we use Golang and TypeScript but any high-level language is good)
* Experience with event-driven / asynchronous designs
* A considerate, inclusive and team player spirit

### **IT WOULD BE GREAT IF YOU HAD THESE DESIRABLE SKILLS**

* Experience with Golang to a good proficiency level
* Experience with Service Mesh technologies like Istio
* Experience in multi-cloud Kubernetes deployments
* Understanding of OAuth/OIDC flows and AuthN/AuthZ in general
* SRE concepts and their practical application

### **Here's a little more about us…**


At DAZN, we bring ambition to life. We are innovators, game-changers and pioneers. So, if you want to push boundaries and make an impact, DAZN is the place to be.  

As part of our team,you'll have the opportunity to make your mark and the power to make change happen. We're doing things no-one has done before, giving fans and customers access to sport anytime, anywhere. We're using world-class technology to transform sports and revolutionise the industry and we're not going to stop.
**DAZN VALUES – THE ‘HOW’ IN WHAT WE DO:**
**AMBITIOUS – people who want to make a big impact and drive DAZN forward.**
**INVENTIVE – people with bright ideas who deliver great new experiences for our customers – and improvements for our business. People who come up with better, simpler ways of doing things.**
**PASSIONATE – people who are proud of our product, our content and our business – and love to shout about it. People who love what they do and show commitment every day.**
**BRAVE – people who take difficult decisions to help us focus on improving DAZN, our performance and our results.**
**SUPPORTIVE – people who know that we achieve more as a team than as individuals. People value inclusion and look out for each other, helping their colleagues enjoy their work and develop their careers. People who consider others before making decisions.**  

At DAZN, we are committed to fostering an inclusive environment that values equality and diversity, where everyone can contribute and have their voices heard. This means hiring and developing talent across all races, ethnicities, religions, age groups, sexual orientations, gender identities and abilities.  

Everyone has the opportunity to make change and impact our DEI journey by joining our ERGs: Proud@DAZN, Women@DAZN, Disability@DAZN and ParentZone.

If you’d like to include a cover letter with your application, please feel free to. Please do not feel you need to apply with a photo or disclose any other information that is not related to your professional experience.

Our aim is to make our hiring processes as accessible for everyone as possible, including providing adjustments for interviews where we can.

We look forward to hearing from you.

title: Full Stack Developer
description:
**Date Posted:**


2024-02-26**Country:**


India**Location:**


North Gate Business Park Sy.No 2/1, and Sy.No 2/2, KIAL Road, Venkatala Village, Chowdeshwari Layout, Yelahanka, Bangalore, Karnataka 560064**Position Role Type:**


Unspecified**Major / Primary Responsibilities:**

* Software Application Development in an Agile Product development environment
* Adhering to Agile Project management methodologies and meet client delivery schedules
* Understanding of functional requirements, requirements analysis, Design and estimation of tasks
* Development and Coding using Python for Backend and React for front end.
* Adhering to coding standards, Unit Testing, and Integration Testing
* Perform Code review of peers.

**Secondary Responsibilities:**

* Excellent communication with stakeholders on status/progress of tasks and support calls along with ability to lead conversations about product maturation and direction .
* Ensuring adherence to Quality management, Quality process and standards, documentation
* Ensuring that the KRA/KPI points set are met in a time bound fashion.

**Required Candidate profile**

* Expert in Python (minimum 6+ years), with knowledge of at least one Python web framework such as Django, Flask, etc.
* Must have full stack experience.
* Writing reusable, testable, and efficient code
* Design and implementation of low-latency, high-availability, and performant applications
* Ability to develop front end using React or similar tools.
* Ability to integrate front end and back end.
* Good understanding of DevOps principles.
* Proficient understanding of code versioning tools such as Git or SVN.
* Good Understanding and working knowledge of Docker for containerization.
* Good Understanding and working knowledge of Kubernetes.
* Understanding and working knowledge of Java is a good to have skill.
* Familiarity with event-driven programming in Python
* Understanding of fundamental design principles behind a scalable application
* Strong unit test and debugging skills

**Basic Qualifications:**

* Bachelor's/Master's degree in Engineering


Collins Aerospace, a Raytheon Technologies company, is a leader in technologically advanced and intelligent solutions for the global aerospace and defense industry. Collins Aerospace has the capabilities, comprehensive portfolio and expertise to solve customers’ toughest challenges and to meet the demands of a rapidly evolving global market.


Collins Aerospace’s Aerostructures business is a world leader in the design, manufacture, integration and support of nacelles - the aerodynamic structures which house aircraft engines. Our nacelle technologies improve fuel efficiency, reduce engine noise and supply critical stopping power when an airplane lands. Today, our innovative nacelle systems are featured on many of the world’s newest and most game-changing commercial, regional and business jet platforms. And we’re not stopping there: we’re working hard to create the next generation of nacelles that are greener, quieter and more efficient. In addition, our Engineered Polymer Products division is a leading developer and manufacturer of advanced, high-performance composite and elastomeric structures and products for marine applications. Whether in the air or underwater, we’re pushing the limits of innovation. Want to join us on this important journey?

**Collins Aerospace Diversity & Inclusion Statement:**

**Diversity drives innovation; inclusion drives success**. We believe a multitude of approaches and ideas enable us to deliver the best results for our workforce, workplace, and customers. We are committed to fostering a culture where all employees can share their passions and ideas so we can tackle the toughest challenges in our industry and pave new paths to limitless possibility.

* Please consider the following role type definitions as you apply for this role.

**Onsite:** Employees who are working in Onsite roles will work primarily onsite. This includes all production and maintenance employees, as they are essential to the development of our products.

**Hybrid:** Employees who are working in Hybrid roles will work regularly both onsite and offsite. Ratio of time working onsite will be determined in partnership with your leader.

**Remote:** Employees who are working in Remote roles will work primarily offsite (from home). An employee may be expected to travel to the site location as needed.


Regardless of your role type, collaboration and innovation are critical to our business and all employees will have access to digital tools so they can work with colleagues around the world – and access to Collins sites when their work requires in-person meetings.

**WE ARE REDEFINING AEROSPACE.**


Some of our competitive benefits package includes:


**Benefits package includes:**

* Transportation facility.
* Group Term Life Insurance.
* Group Health Insurance.
* Group Personal Accident Insurance.
* Entitled for 18 days of vacation and 12 days of sick leave annually.
* Employee scholar programme.
* Work life balance.
* Car lease programme.
* National Pension Scheme
* LTA
* Fuel & Maintenance /Driver wages
* Meal vouchers


Nothing matters more to Collins Aerospace than our strong ethical and safety commitments. As such, all India positions require a background check, which may include a drug screen.


Note:

* Background check required (every external new hire in the India)
* Drug Screen only performed for Operations Positions


At Collins, the paths we pave together lead to limitless possibility. And the bonds we form – with our customers and with each other - propel us all higher, again and again.

  



Apply now and be part of the team that’s redefining aerospace, every day.

***RTX is An Equal*** ***Opportunity/Affirmative*** ***Action Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or veteran status, age or any other federally protected class.***

**Privacy Policy and Terms:**


Click on this link to read the Policy and Terms

title: Senior Product Manager
description:
### **Join Skillz and Level Up Your Career!**



Are you ready to take your career to the next level? Join Skillz, the first publicly-traded mobile esports platform that hosts billions of casual mobile gaming tournaments for millions of players worldwide. Skillz is revolutionizing the gaming industry, providing the ultimate platform for competitive mobile games. By fostering social competition within games, Skillz empowers developers to create multi-million dollar franchises while connecting players through fair, enjoyable, and meaningful competition.



At Skillz, we firmly believe that everyone is born with unique skills and deserves to experience an epic win. We understand the thrill of achievement and the satisfaction of overcoming challenges. That's why we passionately champion game developers and players alike, empowering them to unleash their full potential through the power of competition.


### **Life @ Skillz**


* Culture of Impact: Join a united team of builders, creators, innovators, and entrepreneurs driven by the desire to win. At Skillz, we create value and make a difference in the world.
* Comprehensive Benefits: We value our team members and provide a comprehensive benefits package to ensure your well-being. Enjoy 401K matching, equity incentives, extensive medical, dental, and vision coverage, pre-tax benefit options, and more.
* Work-Life Balance: Achieving work-life balance is important to us. We offer competitive paid time off (PTO) & company holidays to help you recharge and pursue your passions.
* Perks: We believe in enhancing your work experience. Enjoy weekly team lunches, snacks, Friday Happy Hours, commuter benefits, insurances, and many more.

### **Why Skillz?**


* Pioneers of Skill-Based Competition: Skillz is not just any company in the gaming industry; we are the pioneer of skill-based competition. Join us in transforming the way people play games and building the home of competition for all.
* Impact Beyond Gaming: Skillz harnesses the power of its platform to support nonprofit organizations such as the American Red Cross, Susan G. Komen, American Cancer Society, the NAACP, and more. By participating in Skillz tournaments, you can make a difference and contribute to causes you care about.
* Recognized Success: Skillz has earned recognition as one of Fast Company's Most Innovative Companies, CNBC's Disruptor 50, San Francisco Business Times' Best Places to Work, Forbes' Next Billion-Dollar Startups, and the #1 fastest-growing company in America on the Inc. 5000 list, and many more.
* Talent Magnet: Join a team of talented professionals who are passionate about what they do. Our team includes experts from Meta, Apple, Amazon, Google, Microsoft, Twitter, Roblox, Samsung, EA, Riot, Tinder, Intel, Twitch, and more.

### **The Future of Gaming Awaits!**



The gaming industry is larger than movies, music, and books combined, with over 3 billion active gamers playing monthly and over 25 million active developers worldwide. Mobile gaming, in particular, is the fastest-growing segment, projected to reach $300 billion by 2025. At Skillz, you have the opportunity to be at the forefront of this exciting industry and shape its future.


### **Skillz is searching for an accomplished Senior Product Manager in Bangalore, focusing on driving roadmap execution and delivery. You will be instrumental in shaping the technical delivery within our Consumer Experience division, headquartered in our new office in Bangalore.**



In this position, you will be responsible for providing strategic direction for the product management function, ensuring the successful implementation of our roadmap, and contributing to the overall success of Skillz. Your role will encompass inspiring a culture of challenging the status quo, promoting data-driven decisions and KPIs, leading through example, and fostering innovation within the eSports domain. This is a unique opportunity for an experienced product manager to impact the eSport space significantly.


### **What we are looking for:**



* Durability and Resiliency - A startup mindset and comfortable building from the ground up.


* Ability to work cross-functionally with stakeholders to define the consumer product vision, strategy, and roadmap for achievements and social game modes aligned with the overall company product roadmap and business strategy.


* A strategic thinker who can own the overall plan, including design, implementation, GTM, and analysis framework of features and functional refinements.


* Ability to work with the Leadership team to estimate ship dates of major deliverables with 75% or better accuracy.


* Excellent communicator capable of clearly sharing feature development progress, metric impact, etc, to a multi-functional group.


* Ability to work with the Director, Product Management to understand and articulate the company mission to the Engineering and Design teams.


### **Requirements:**



* 3+ years of PM / Live operations experience.


* 4-6 years of experience building and delivering user-centered, engaging experiences across a range of platforms and an ability to demonstrate the success and impact of efforts for both users and business, with at least 2 years in games (RMG or F2P mobile)


* A great communicator (verbal, written, and visual) who can influence and build consensus within a product team and with executive stakeholders across the company.


* Experience building web or mobile gameplay, competition features and/or social experiences in social casino or puzzle games a strong plus.


### **Join Skillz and Let's Redefine the Boundaries of Gaming!**



Together, we'll create a world where skill, passion, and innovation thrive. Join our team and be part of the journey. We look forward to having you on board!



#LI-Onsite #LI-JM1


Skillz embraces diversity and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. As part of our commitment to diversifying our workforce, we do not discriminate on the basis of age, race, sex, gender, gender identity, color, religion, national origin, sexual orientation, marital status, citizenship, veteran status, or disability status, and we operate in compliance with the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance*.*

* A sound knowledge and experience with containerised or serverless workloads
* Coding experience (we use Golang and TypeScript but any high-level language is good)
* Experience with event-driven / asynchronous designs
* A considerate, inclusive and team player spirit

### **IT WOULD BE GREAT IF YOU HAD THESE DESIRABLE SKILLS**

* Experience with Golang to a good proficiency level
* Experience with Service Mesh technologies like Istio
* Experience in multi-cloud Kubernetes deployments
* Understanding of OAuth/OIDC flows and AuthN/AuthZ in general
* SRE concepts and their practical application

### **Here's a little more about us…**


At DAZN, we bring ambition to life. We are innovators, game-changers and pioneers. So, if you want to push boundaries and make an impact, DAZN is the place to be.  

As part of our team,you'll have the opportunity to make your mark and the power to make change happen. We're doing things no-one has done before, giving fans and customers access to sport anytime, anywhere. We're using world-class technology to transform sports and revolutionise the industry and we're not going to stop.
**DAZN VALUES – THE ‘HOW’ IN WHAT WE DO:**
**AMBITIOUS – people who want to make a big impact and drive DAZN forward.**
**INVENTIVE – people with bright ideas who deliver great new experiences for our customers – and improvements for our business. People who come up with better, simpler ways of doing things.**
**PASSIONATE – people who are proud of our product, our content and our business – and love to shout about it. People who love what they do and show commitment every day.**
**BRAVE – people who take difficult decisions to help us focus on improving DAZN, our performance and our results.**
**SUPPORTIVE – people who know that we achieve more as a team than as individuals. People value inclusion and look out for each other, helping their colleagues enjoy their work and develop their careers. People who consider others before making decisions.**  

At DAZN, we are committed to fostering an inclusive environment that values equality and diversity, where everyone can contribute and have their voices heard. This means hiring and developing talent across all races, ethnicities, religions, age groups, sexual orientations, gender identities and abilities.  

Everyone has the opportunity to make change and impact our DEI journey by joining our ERGs: Proud@DAZN, Women@DAZN, Disability@DAZN and ParentZone.

If you’d like to include a cover letter with your application, please feel free to. Please do not feel you need to apply with a photo or disclose any other information that is not related to your professional experience.

Our aim is to make our hiring processes as accessible for everyone as possible, including providing adjustments for interviews where we can.

We look forward to hearing from you.

title: Web Developer
description:
Our business is looking for an experienced HTML5 Game Developer to join our team. In this role, you will work with our game design team throughout the design cycle. You will also perform quality testing to ensure there are no issues with the interface design or other components of the game before release.

* Experience different H5 Game Frameworks used in the industry like Construct etc.
* Use game engines to build video games and content
* Design, build and maintain, reusable and reliable code.
* Ability to quickly get up to speed with existing code.
* Transforming design ideas and specifications into functional games.
* Identifying and fixing code errors and game bottlenecks.
* Testing game functionality and theme dynamics.
* Ensuring the best performance, quality, and responsiveness of games.
* Collaborate closely in a small, nimble, cross-functional team with creatives in an iterative agile environment, providing and receiving regular feedback.
* Work as part of a team, but with plenty of opportunities to take responsibility on an individual level.

Requirements:

* Experience working as an Html 5 game development and familiarity with web development languages, including JavaScript and HTML5
* Experience different HTML5 Game frameworks used in the industry like CreateJS, Phaser.io, PixiJS, and Cocos2d-X.
* Knowledge of 2D/3D development and integrated games.
* Experience with memory and space optimization.
* Understanding of different game technology areas (gameplay, graphics, UI, etc. ).
* Excellent attention to detail.
* Competencies in game design patterns, data structures, algorithms, software design, and OOPs.
* Good understanding of Multiplayer game architecture.
* Proficiency in using version control tools(Git, SVN, Mercurial).
* Experience perform QA testing
* Ability to integrate with cross platforms Environments (Android, IOS, Web).

title: Full Stack Developer
description:
**Fullstack Shopify Developer with C# - (Remote)**

**Experience:** 3+ years

**Salary :** AUD 2,250 - 3,000 / month

**Expected Notice Period**: 2 to 4 Weeks

**Shift**: 5:30AM to 2:30PM IST

**Opportunity Type:** Remote

**Placement Type:** Contractual

Contract Duration: Part-Time, 12 months

**(\\*Note: This is a requirement for one of Uplers' clients)**

**What do you need for this opportunity?**

**Primary Skills**:

CI/CD, CSS, Shopify API Integration, C#, ECommerce SEO, Git, HTML, JavaScript, NoSql, Shopify, SQL, Strong Attention To Detail

**Assessment:** 

Role based AI Screening covering Communication and Technical Skills

**Our Hiring Partner is Looking for:**

Fullstack Shopify Developer with C# - (Remote) who is passionate about their work, eager to learn and grow, and who is committed to delivering exceptional results. If you are a team player, with a positive attitude and a desire to make a difference, then we want to hear from you.

**Roles & Responsibilities**

* Developing scalable, responsive, and user-friendly web applications from scratch.
* Collaborating with product management and design teams to translate user requirements and wireframes into functional front-end code.
* Develop custom Shopify themes and templates to meet specific design requirements and user experience goals.
* Developing custom Shopify applications.
* Building reusable code and libraries for future use, ensuring the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs.
* Developing server-side logic and database schemas for back-end integration, ensuring high performance and responsiveness.
* Integrating third-party APIs and services as needed to enhance application functionality.
* Conducting thorough testing and debugging to ensure the stability and security of web applications.
* Optimizing applications for maximum speed and scalability, implementing best practices for SEO and accessibility.
* Staying updated on emerging technologies and industry trends, continuously improving development processes and workflows.
* Providing technical support and troubleshooting assistance for existing web applications as required.

**Engagement Type:**

* Hire full time employees on Uplers payroll
* Uplers / Talent Agreement - Full-time 12 months Project Based Employment
* The candidate is eligible for Leave, Device, Other Perks & Benefits as per the final approval from the client.

**Project Requirements:**

* Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Software Engineering, or related field.
* Proven experience at least 3 years’ experience in web development.
* Proficiency in front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript and modern frameworks/libraries.
* Strong understanding of object-oriented programming, in particular C#.
* Experience working with databases (SQL and NoSQL).
* Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and CI/CD pipelines.
* Experience with Shopify theme development and customization using Liquid templating language.
* Understanding of Shopify's API and in particular experience with the extensibility API.
* Integrate third-party apps and services.
* Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
* Ability to work both independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.
* Strong communication skills and a positive attitude towards learning and professional growth.

**Key Competencies:** 

* Collaborative Approach: Recognize that success is a collective effort. Actively seek input from diverse perspectives, promote effective communication, and foster a team-oriented approach to problem-solving.
* Results-Oriented Professional: With an outcome-driven focus, you consistently prioritize achieving tangible results in all endeavors. Your strategic approach ensures that every action taken is aligned with overarching goals, driving measurable impact and success.
* Adaptive and Resilient: You thrive in a dynamic and ever-changing environment. See challenges as growth opportunities. Develop mental toughness to bounce back from setbacks. Embrace adversity with tenacity, learning, and a positive outlook. Cultivate resilience through perseverance and adaptability.
* Customer-Centric: Understand and prioritize the needs of customers and clients. Cultivate a mindset that revolves around delivering exceptional value and service to build long-lasting relationships.
* Continuous Improvement: View every experience as an opportunity to learn and grow. Encourage a commitment to self-improvement and the refinement of processes, promoting a culture of continuous learning and development.
* Authentic and Inclusive: You believe in the power of diversity and actively foster an inclusive workplace. You appreciate the unique perspectives and talents that individuals from diverse backgrounds bring to the table.

**How to apply for this opportunity?**

* Register or login on our portal & fill out the application
* Clear the given AI Screening (30 min) and Click on ‘Apply’ to get shortlisted
* Our team of talent matchmakers will matchmake you with the client
* Crack a quick interview with our client
* Land your global dream job and get your exciting career started!

**About our Hiring Partner:**

The Company has been leading the way in the brow styling game since 2017. Their revolutionary range of brow-focused products is developed to the highest of standards, exceeding the expectations of the brow-obsessed, DIY enthusiasts, and professional stylists worldwide. They have raised the bar in brow styling, which is why their products are stocked by over 150,000 salons and retailers worldwide.

**About Uplers:**

Our goal is to make hiring reliable, simple, and fast. Our role will be to help all our talents find and apply for relevant opportunities and progress in their career. We will support any grievances or challenges you may face during the engagement. You will also be assigned to a dedicated Talent Success Coach during the engagement.

(**Note:** There are many more opportunities apart from this on the portal. Depending on the assessments you clear, you can apply for them as well).

So, if you are ready for a new challenge, a great work environment, and an opportunity to take your career to the next level, don't hesitate to apply today. We are waiting for you!

* Remote

title: Software Engineer
description:
Job: IRC211799
  

Location: India - Chennai, Hyderabad
  

Designation: Associate Consultant
  

Experience: 5-10 years
  

Function: Engineering
  

Skills: Amazon Machine Learning, AWS, AWS S3, Django, Docker, IronPython, JavaScript, Linux
  

Work Model: Hybrid
  
**Description:**
----------------


Join GlobalLogic, to be a valid part of the team working on a huge software project for the world-class company providing M2M / IoT 4G/5G modules e.g. to the automotive, healthcare and logistics industries. Through our engagement, we contribute to our customer in developing the end-user modules’ firmware, implementing new features, maintaining compatibility with the newest telecommunication and industry standards, as well as performing analysis and estimations of the customer requirements.


**Requirements:**
-----------------


Requirements:


* 5+ years of professional software development experience
* 4+ years of experience with Python
* 4+ years of experience in React JS
* Good exp in AIML, min 3 yrs
* Extensive experience with CI/CD tools:
* Extensive experience with cloud service provider: AWS, AWS S3
* Experience in developing large scale products in the field of industrial automation is a strong plus.
* Strong understanding of web application best practices and git development flow
* Focused, dependable, detail-oriented and hands-on – completes tasks quickly and thoroughly
* Excellent work ethics and communication skills – written, verbal and interpersonal
* Good command of written and spoken English, good team player, drive to grow and learn.
  


  

**Job Responsibilities:**
-------------------------


* Designing and developing back-end components of scalable software using Python, designing and implementation of robust applications with reusable, testable and efficient code.
* Integrating of data storage solutions (database architecture).
* Developer testing, performance testing, code review and refactoring of the code.
* Working with versioning control (Git), CI/CD processes, containerization (Docker) and DevOps practices using cloud service provider technologies (AWS, AWS S3).
* Working with agile development methodologies (Scrum, Kanban, SAFe).
* Working with distributed teams.

  



  

**What We Offer**
-----------------


**Exciting Projects:** We focus on industries like High-Tech, communication, media, healthcare, retail and telecom. Our customer list is full of fantastic global brands and leaders who love what we build for them.


**Collaborative Environment:** You Can expand your skills by collaborating with a diverse team of highly talented people in an open, laidback environment — or even abroad in one of our global centers or client facilities!


**Work-Life Balance:** GlobalLogic prioritizes work-life balance, which is why we offer flexible work schedules, opportunities to work from home, and paid time off and holidays.


**Professional Development:** Our dedicated Learning & Development team regularly organizes Communication skills training(GL Vantage, Toast Master),Stress Management program, professional certifications, and technical and soft skill trainings.


**Excellent Benefits:** We provide our employees with competitive salaries, family medical insurance, Group Term Life Insurance, Group Personal Accident Insurance , NPS(National Pension Scheme ), Periodic health awareness program, extended maternity leave, annual performance bonuses, and referral bonuses.


**Fun Perks:** We want you to love where you work, which is why we host sports events, cultural activities, offer food on subsidies rates, Corporate parties. Our vibrant offices also include dedicated GL Zones, rooftop decks and GL Club where you can drink coffee or tea with your colleagues over a game of table and offer discounts for popular stores and restaurants!


**About GlobalLogic**
---------------------


GlobalLogic is a leader in digital engineering. We help brands across the globe design and build innovative products, platforms, and digital experiences for the modern world. By integrating experience design, complex engineering, and data expertise—we help our clients imagine what’s possible, and accelerate their transition into tomorrow’s digital businesses. Headquartered in Silicon Valley, GlobalLogic operates design studios and engineering centers around the world, extending our deep expertise to customers in the automotive, communications, financial services, healthcare and life sciences, manufacturing, media and entertainment, semiconductor, and technology industries. GlobalLogic is a Hitachi Group Company operating under Hitachi, Ltd. (TSE: 6501) which contributes to a sustainable society with a higher quality of life by driving innovation through data and technology as the Social Innovation Business.

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
Our customer is a mobile-gaming studio & we love telling beautifully crafted stories with cultural resonance. We aim to create a new benchmark in casual games for Indian and global audiences. Our games are Casual, Fun, and familiar because of local cultural themes.  

Our Vision is to bring world class gaming experiences to the Indian audiences and to build truly Indian experiences for the world. We aim to bring together people who share the same vision and are looking to make it a reality.


**Job Description:**



We are seeking an experienced Senior Unity Mobile Game Developer to lead the development of engaging and immersive mobile games. As a Senior Unity Mobile Game Developer, you will work closely with a talented team of designers, artists, and engineers to create captivating gaming experiences for iOS and Android platforms.

 **Responsibilities:**


* Lead the development of mobile games using Unity engine, from concept to launch.
* Architect and implement gameplay mechanics, systems, and features optimized for mobile devices.
* Collaborate with designers and artists to integrate assets and ensure the creative vision is realized in the final product.
* Optimize game performance for mobile platforms, including memory usage, frame rate, and battery consumption.
* Mentor junior developers and provide technical guidance on Unity game development best practices.
* Stay updated with the latest Unity features, tools, and technologies to enhance game development workflows.
* Conduct code reviews and ensure adherence to coding standards and project guidelines.
* Work closely with producers and project managers to define project milestones, schedules, and deliverables.
* Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues throughout the development lifecycle.
* Contribute to the improvement of game development processes and methodologies.


**Requirements:**


* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Game Development, or related field. Master's degree preferred.
* Proven experience as a Senior Unity Developer or similar role, with at least [insert number] years of experience in mobile game development.
* Proficiency in C# programming language and deep understanding of Unity engine.
* Strong knowledge of mobile game development principles, including optimization techniques and platform-specific requirements.
* Experience with mobile game development for both iOS and Android platforms.
* Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
* Ability to work effectively in a collaborative team environment.
* Familiarity with version control systems such as Git.
* Solid understanding of 3D mathematics and physics.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.


**Preferred Qualifications:**


* Previous experience with multiplayer and networked mobile game development.
* Experience with shader programming and visual effects in Unity.

title: Developer
description:
Relocation Assistance Offered Within Country  

# 158663 - Mumbai, Maharashtra, India  

  

**Who We Are**  

Colgate-Palmolive Company is a caring, innovative growth company that is reimagining a healthier future for all people, their pets and our planet. Focused on Oral Care, Personal Care, Home Care and Pet Nutrition, we sell our products in more than 200 countries and territories under brands such as Colgate, Palmolive, elmex, hello, meridol, Sorriso, Tom’s of Maine, EltaMD, Filorga, Irish Spring, PCA SKIN, Protex, Sanex, Softsoap, Speed Stick, Ajax, Axion, Fabuloso, Soupline and Suavitel, as well as Hill’s Pet Nutrition.  

  

We are recognized for our leadership and innovation in promoting sustainability and community wellbeing, including our achievements in decreasing plastic waste and promoting recyclability, saving water, conserving natural resources and improving children’s oral health.  

  

If you want to work for a company that lives by their values, then give your career a reason to smile and join our global team!

**About Us**
------------

**Would you like to be part of a team that is building a future to smile about? What about having the opportunity to collaborate with teams across the world, full of stimulating discussions, and making impactful contributions? If this is how you see your career, Colgate is the place to be! Our diligent household brands, dedicated employees, and sustainability commitments make us passionate about building a future to smile about for our employees, consumers, and surrounding communities. We, at Colgate, take immense pride in our brand which fuels our workplace to encourage innovative thinking, champion experimentation, promote authenticity and thus add to our enduring success.**
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**If you want to work for a company that lives by their values, then give your career a reason to smile...every single day !**
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Job Summary-**
----------------


We are looking for a learning media developer (graphic designer) to help us create and develop learning materials including (engaging visual designs for eLearnings, videos, animations, infographics, game designs, banners, newsletters, brandbook, templates, layouts, icons etc.) for all global learning and development purposes.

**What you will do-**
---------------------

* Production of videos, animations, graphics, GIFs, banners & infographics etc.
* Development of content using industry standard development tools (such as Adobe Creative Suite, Articulate 360)
* Design and develop creative video/interactive content for all learning assets, print and digital media
* Conceptualize GIF Animations and visuals based on requirements
* Develop illustrations, logos and other designs
* Work with Instructional designers, developers, business stakeholders and conceptualize design elements

**Required Education/ Experience**
----------------------------------

* Graduation with good communication skills is a must
* Minimum 4 - 5 years experience in developing digital learning assets
* Bachelors or Masters or equivalent experience in graphic design, digital design, motion graphics would be preferred
* Required Experience with design tools like Adobe suite - Photoshop, Illustrator, Indesign, Premier Pro, After Effects and Articulate Storyline
* Required Experience with video development tools, Vyond, Animaker etc.
* Experience with UI/UX (using Adobe XD & Figma) would be an added advantage

**Required Skills & Competencies**
----------------------------------

**Function Specific:**
----------------------

* Keen eye for detail and aesthetics!
* Excellent communication skills with global perspective is required
* Driving innovation in design and development

**Personality Traits:**
-----------------------

* Individual contributor with good communication skills
* Planning & priority setting and handling deliverables
* Project management skills, including the ability to work independently and to lead multiple priorities while meeting timelines
* Relationship building and problem-solving that leads to effective solutions

 **Our Commitment to Sustainability**  

With the Colgate brand in more homes than any other, we are presented with great opportunities and new challenges as we work to integrate sustainability into all aspects of our business and create positive social impact. We are determined to position ourselves for further growth as we act on our 2025 Sustainability & Social Impact Strategy.  

  

**Our Commitment to Diversity, Equity & Inclusion**  

Achieving our purpose starts with our people — ensuring our workforce represents the people and communities we serve —and creating an environment where our people feel they belong; where we can be our authentic selves, feel treated with respect and have the support of leadership to impact the business in a meaningful way.  

  

**Equal Opportunity Employer**  

Colgate is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, national origin, ethnicity, age, disability, marital status, veteran status (United States positions), or any other characteristic protected by law.  

  

Reasonable accommodation during the application process is available for persons with disabilities. Please contact Application\\_Accommodation@colpal.com with the subject "Accommodation Request" should you require accommodation.

title: C++ Developer
description:
We are seeking an experience resource with C++ Development to become a part of the 3D Visualization Technologies Team based out of Pune. Team up with Rendering engine development experts around the world, focused on developing highly interactive and realistic 3D Visualization. Join us in developing the worlds leading solution provider for Product Design & Experience across Industries. Do you enjoy challenge? Here at Dassault Systmes, we empower people with passion to change the world.


**Role & Responsibilities:**


* This position will provide the opportunity to work in a team responsible for rendering engine widely used across Dassault Systemes 3DEXPERIENCE portfolio and related applications in a world-wide development infrastructure.
* You are expected to quickly learn the specifications & architecture of rendering engine & continuously develop its performance and capabilities.

* B.E/B.Tech /M.E/M.Tech ( Comp. Sc., IT, E&TC, Mech ) OR MCA.
* Academics with 60% minimum through-out with No GAPS.

* You should have 5-10 Years of experience in C++ Development using Design Patterns, Multi-threading, etc.
* You must have strong computer science fundamentals ( OS, Compilers, Drivers, CPU/GPU.. ).
* You should have strong experience in developing software that require 2D / 3D Rendering.
* You must have exposure to one or more of OpenGL/Directx/WebGL/Vulkan, Video/image formats, Shaders programming.

As a Business Analyst at DAZN, you will be responsible for bridging the gap between the technology teams and the business stakeholders. You will be a part of a team that is responsible for delivering high-quality products and services to our customers. You will be expected to understand the business requirements and translate them into functional requirements that the technology teams can use to develop the product. You will work closely with product managers, developers, and quality assurance to ensure that the products meet the business requirements.
Key Responsibilities:
Candidate should have over all 5+ years of experience, Collaborate with product managers to identify and define the business requirements for new products and services.Translate business requirements into functional requirements that can be used by the technology teams.Work with developers and quality assurance teams to ensure that the product meets the business requirements and quality standards.Conduct market research to understand the competitive landscape and identify opportunities for improvement.Analyse data to identify trends and insights that can be used to improve the product.Work with the product team to develop user stories and use cases that define how the product will be used.Create wireframes and prototypes to help communicate the product vision and requirements to the development team.Participate in sprint planning and review meetings to ensure that the product is on track to meet the business requirements.Conduct user acceptance testing to ensure that the product meets the business requirements and quality standards.
Requirements:
Bachelor’s degree in a related field, such as Computer Science, Information Technology, or Business Administration.Minimum of 8 years of experience as a business analyst, preferably in a technology environment.Experience with Agile development methodologies.Strong analytical skills and attention to detail.Excellent communication and collaboration skills.Knowledge of user experience (UX) design principles and practices.Experience with data analysis and visualization tools.Knowledge of sports and media industry is a plus.If you are a highly motivated individual who is passionate about technology, sports, and delivering high-quality products to customers, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity with DAZN.
### **Here's a little more about us…**


At DAZN, we bring ambition to life. We are innovators, game-changers and pioneers. So, if you want to push boundaries and make an impact, DAZN is the place to be.  

As part of our team,you'll have the opportunity to make your mark and the power to make change happen. We're doing things no-one has done before, giving fans and customers access to sport anytime, anywhere. We're using world-class technology to transform sports and revolutionise the industry and we're not going to stop.
**DAZN VALUES – THE ‘HOW’ IN WHAT WE DO:**
**AMBITIOUS – people who want to make a big impact and drive DAZN forward.**
**INVENTIVE – people with bright ideas who deliver great new experiences for our customers – and improvements for our business. People who come up with better, simpler ways of doing things.**
**PASSIONATE – people who are proud of our product, our content and our business – and love to shout about it. People who love what they do and show commitment every day.**
**BRAVE – people who take difficult decisions to help us focus on improving DAZN, our performance and our results.**
**SUPPORTIVE – people who know that we achieve more as a team than as individuals. People value inclusion and look out for each other, helping their colleagues enjoy their work and develop their careers. People who consider others before making decisions.**  

At DAZN, we are committed to fostering an inclusive environment that values equality and diversity, where everyone can contribute and have their voices heard. This means hiring and developing talent across all races, ethnicities, religions, age groups, sexual orientations, gender identities and abilities.  

Everyone has the opportunity to make change and impact our DEI journey by joining our ERGs: Proud@DAZN, Women@DAZN, Disability@DAZN and ParentZone.

If you’d like to include a cover letter with your application, please feel free to. Please do not feel you need to apply with a photo or disclose any other information that is not related to your professional experience.

Our aim is to make our hiring processes as accessible for everyone as possible, including providing adjustments for interviews where we can.

We look forward to hearing from you.

title: Warehouse Lead
description:
**Job Description**
-------------------


**Job Title:**
Team Lead - Backend(Node.JS)
**Location:**
Hyderabad, India
**Schedule:**
Full-Time, Permanent
**Team:**
Software Engineering
**Department:**
Technology
**What's your new role about?**
-------------------------------


As a Team Lead at DAZN, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining DAZN's web applications. You will work closely with a team of developers and other stakeholders to deliver high-quality software that meets business requirements.
### **Key Responsibilities:**


* Design and develop web applications using Node.JS, and cloud
* Collaborate with other team members to ensure software meets business requirements and is delivered on time
* Write clean, maintainable, and testable code
* Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to other team members
* Develop and maintain project plans and schedules
* Identify and troubleshoot software defects and issues
* Participate in the agile development process, including sprint planning, stand-ups, and retrospectives
* Stay up-to-date with industry trends and technologies

### **Requirements:**


* Bachelor’s degree with minimum of 6+ years of software development experience in commercial, enterprise-level product environments
* Strong experience in building Backend services using NodeJS/react
* Hands-on knowledge of Linux OS(RHEL/Ubuntu), shell scripting and Git
* Experience building scalable cloud-based applications
* Experience of NoSQL databases like MongoDB,Cassandra, Elasticsearch
* Awareness/experience of Cloud Platforms AWS/Azure
* Experience with Unit testing framework like JUnit, Mokito.
* Experience with Server back end and API/Service development.
* Knowledge with network protocols such as TCP/IP, HTTP.
* Experience with all phases of the Software Development Lifecycle, including system analysis, design, coding, testing, debugging and documentation.

### **Nice to have:**


* Familiarity with media streaming or video technologies
* Knowledge of database design and development, particularly with SQL and NoSQL databases
* Experience with containerization and orchestration technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes
* Experience with other programming languages, such as Python or Java
* Experience with front-end frameworks other than React.JS, such as Angular or Vue.js

### **Here's a little more about us…**


At DAZN, we bring ambition to life. We are innovators, game-changers and pioneers. So, if you want to push boundaries and make an impact, DAZN is the place to be.  

As part of our team,you'll have the opportunity to make your mark and the power to make change happen. We're doing things no-one has done before, giving fans and customers access to sport anytime, anywhere. We're using world-class technology to transform sports and revolutionise the industry and we're not going to stop.

**PASSIONATE – people who are proud of our product, our content and our business – and love to shout about it. People who love what they do and show commitment every day.**
**BRAVE – people who take difficult decisions to help us focus on improving DAZN, our performance and our results.**
**SUPPORTIVE – people who know that we achieve more as a team than as individuals. People value inclusion and look out for each other, helping their colleagues enjoy their work and develop their careers. People who consider others before making decisions.**  

At DAZN, we are committed to fostering an inclusive environment that values equality and diversity, where everyone can contribute and have their voices heard. This means hiring and developing talent across all races, ethnicities, religions, age groups, sexual orientations, gender identities and abilities.  

Everyone has the opportunity to make change and impact our DEI journey by joining our ERGs: Proud@DAZN, Women@DAZN, Disability@DAZN and ParentZone.

title: Developer
description:
**Job Description**  

Developers are many, wizards are few, If you have what it takes, we're looking for you! Ailoitte Technologies is looking for young back-end ninjas who are passionate about building high performance, reusable and reliable code. Have a thirst to learn new technologies and updating themselves to find new solutions to meet the needs of our constantly growing business and technologies services.  

  

**Responsibilities :**  

* Build reusable code and libraries for future use.
* Own & build new modules/features end-to-end independently.
* Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders.


  

**Required Skills :**  

* Master in Node.js and frameworks available for it (Knowledge of Loopback/Express is a big plus)
* Good understanding of NoSQL(MongoDB) and SQL Databases.
* Understanding the nature of asynchronous programming, event-driven programming, and its quirks and workarounds.
* Open Source and DevOps enthusiast (understanding of AWS services like EC2, Auto Scaling, Load balancer, Route 53, ElastiCache, CloudFront, S3 etc will be a big plus).
* Comfortable with Test Driven Development.
* Are able to learn and adapt fast, as well as identifying and solving problems.


  

**Qualifications and Education Requirements:**  

* Bachelor’s or Master’s Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or a related technical field or equivalent work experience
* 4+ years of experience in software engineering and development
* 3+ years of back-end development experience including Node.JS
* 1+ years of front-end development experience including React, Angular or Vue.Js
* Prior experience using Git/Github, preferably contributing to open-source projects


  

**Bonus skills:**  

* Experience in developing with MEAN stack.
* Experience with modern JS toolchains such as Grunt, Bower, and Yeoman.
* Understanding of Git, AWS, SPA, Docker.


  

**Job Perks :**  

* Get to work with a highly passionate team of engineers.
* Open and embracing the culture for the latest hot technologies.
* A high level of freedom and responsibility.
* A competitive salary & MacBook Pro.


  

**Company Profile :**  

Ailoitte Technologies is a brand new full-stack, Artificial Intelligence-powered mobile, web application, and game development company. The company was started in 2017 with the objective of becoming a powerhouse of innovation in design and technology for clients globally. Currently, we are creating next-generation Musica.ly, PubG and a disturbing payment system.

title: Software Engineer
description:
**Gameberry Labs**


Soonicorn
Bengaluru/ Bangalore

**1-3 yrs**Experience**10L - 25L**Salary
Unfunded


Start-up


51-200 employees

### **Job Description**

**What you will do:*** Collaborate with product managers, and other developers to understand requirements and translate them into code.
* Write clean, modular, and well-documented code.
* Implement gameplay mechanics, user interfaces, and game features according to design specifications.
* Stay up to date with the latest industry trends, technologies, and best practices in game development.
* Participate in code reviews to provide and receive constructive feedback on code quality and design.
* Contribute to the continuous improvement of development processes and tools.
* Collaborate with QA teams to ensure the delivery of bug-free and high-quality software.

 **What makes you a great fit:*** Strong programming skills in one or more programming languages such as C++, C#, Java, Python or GoLang with a focus on object-oriented design and development.
* Solid understanding of data structures, algorithms, and software engineering principles.
* Experience with game development frameworks and engines (e.g., Unity, Unreal Engine, Cocos) is a plus.
* Knowledge of software development practices, such as version control, testing, and debugging.
* Ability to work collaboratively in a team first environment and effectively communicate technical ideas.
* Strong problem-solving skills and a passion for creating engaging gaming experiences.
* Openness to learn new technologies and adapting to a fast-paced, startup environment.
### **About Gameberry Labs**


At Gameberry Labs, we are building the next-gen social games that aim at bringing people closer. We spread love and happiness. We have successfully built a global user base for our first two games: Ludo STAR and Parcheesi STAR. Based in Bangalore, we are working on creative and innovative ideas around mobile games using the latest technologies. Start-up**Website**


http://gameberrylabs.com**Company Size**


51-200 employees**Headquarters**


Bangalore, Karnataka, India

title: Cloud Engineer
description:
* Bachelor’s degree OR equivalent experience in a technical position
* 2+ years of relevant experience in a technical position (Support or System Administration).
* Demonstrated proficiency in Systems Administration in Linux/Unix (Ubuntu, CentOS, RedHat, Solaris, etc)
* Good understanding of Networking concepts like TCP/IP, DHCP, IP Routing and Name Resolution.
* Effective oral and written communication skills
* Strong customer focus
* Strong multitasking skills
* Self-starter who is excited about technology
* Experience working with customers
* Experience analyzing, troubleshooting, and providing solutions for technical issues


Amazon Web Services is the global market leader and technology forerunner in the Cloud business. As a member of the AWS Support team, you will be at the forefront of this transformational technology, assisting a global list of companies and developers that are taking advantage of a growing set of services and features to run their mission-critical applications. As a Cloud Support Engineer, you will act as the ‘Cloud Ambassador’ across all the cloud products, arming our customers with required tools & tactics to get the most out of their Product and Support investment.
  
  

Would you like to use the latest cloud computing technologies? Do you have an interest in helping customers understand application architectures and integration approaches? Are you familiar with best practices for applications, servers and networks? Do you want to be part of a customer facing technology team in India helping to ensure the success of Amazon Web Services (AWS) as a leading technology organization?
  
  

If you fit the description, you might be the person we are looking for! We are a team that is passionate about cloud computing, and believe that world class support is critical to customer success.
  
  

Key job responsibilities
  
First and foremost this is a customer support role – in The Cloud.
  
On a typical day, a Support Engineer will be primarily responsible for solving customer’s cases through a variety of customer contact channels which include telephone, email, and web/live chat. You will apply advanced troubleshooting techniques to provide tailored solutions for our customers and drive customer interactions by thoughtfully working with customers to dive deep into the root cause of an issue.
  
Apart from working on a broad spectrum of technical issues, an AWS Support Engineer may also coach/mentor new hires, develop & present training, partner with development teams on complex issues or contact deflection initiatives, participate in new hiring, write tools/script to help the team, or work with leadership on process improvement and strategic initiatives to ensure better CX and compliance with global AWS standards, practices and policies.
  
  

**Career development:** We promote advancement opportunities across the organization to help you meet your career goals.
  
**Training:** We have training programs to help you develop the skills required to be successful in your role.
  
Support engineers interested in travel have presented training or participated in focused summits across our sites or at specific AWS events
  
  

A day in the life
  
Every day will bring new and exciting challenges on the job while you:
  
* Learn and use groundbreaking technologies.
* Apply advanced troubleshooting techniques to provide unique solutions to our customers’ individual needs.
* Interact with leading engineers around the world.
* Partner with Amazon teams in India to help reproduce and resolve customer issues.
* Leverage your extensive customer support experience to provide feedback to internal Amazon teams in India on how to improve our services.
* Drive customer communication during critical events.
* Drive projects that improve support-related processes and our customers’ technical support experience.
* Write tutorials, how-to videos, and other technical articles for the developer community.
* Work on critical, highly complex customer problems that may span multiple AWS services.


About the team
  
Amazon Web Services offers a complete set of infrastructure and application services that enable you to run virtually everything in the cloud: from enterprise applications and big ata projects to social games and mobile apps. Explore how millions of customers — including the fastest-growing startups, largest enterprises, and leading government agencies — are using AWS to lower costs, become more agile, and innovate faster.
  
  

We are open to hiring candidates to work out of one of the following locations:
  
  

Bangalore, KA, IND
  
  

* Expertise with IPsec, VPN, Load Balancing, Iperf, MTR, Routing Protocols, SSH, Network Monitoring / Troubleshooting tool.
* Experience with AWS, Google, Rack Space or Soft Layer Management and/or Deployment. · Experience working with customers·
* Experience analyzing, troubleshooting, and providing solutions for technical issues · Some programming / scripting experience (Java, Perl, Ruby, Python)·
* Experience managing full application stacks from the OS up through custom applications

title: Cloud Engineer
description:
* 2+ years of technical support experience
* This role supports and focuses on our Networking services such as Elastic Load Balancing, Cloud Watch, Route 53, VPC (Virtual Private Cloud). Our support engineers are also the “voice of the customer” and have a strong voice in to the development teams for recurring issues or feature requests.
* Bachelor’s degree OR equivalent experience in a technical position
* Requires minimum 2+ years of experience in the relevant technical position
* Experience troubleshooting networking issues using several tools (traceroute, mtr, ping, iperf, dig/nslookup, cURL, tcpdump/Wireshark and related)
* Good Knowledge of network security (SSL/TLS, Network- and Web Application Firewalls, Intrusion Detection and Prevention Services)
* Good Knowledge managing domain transfers, records and DNS security (DNSSEC and DNS Filtering)
* Good OS knowledge oriented to maintenance and administrative purposes (Windows or Linux)
* Experience with Networking and troubleshooting (HTTP, TCP/IP, DNS, Routing and Switching, Load Balancing)

We are open to hiring candidates to work out of one of the following locations:
  
  

Bangalore, KA, IND
  
  

* Experience configuring virtual server environments.
* Knowledge/experience in configuring and supporting devices such as Cisco, Juniper, Fortinet, SonicWALL, Checkpoint, Palo Alto etc.
* Experience managing full application stacks from the OS up through custom applicationsExperience configuring software-based Load Balancing solutions.
* Experience with end to end application monitoring, tracing and alerting using tools like CloudWatch, Grafana, Datadog, Prometheus etc.
